posts.post_title: SOLD FS Cycle 460 Rube Geyer SGC 30
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this SGC graded 1911 T206 Cycle 460 of Rube Geyer for sale. Tough card. Only 4 listed on the SGC pop report. None listed on the PSA pop report.

Price: $150.00 SOLD

Shipping: $2.50

Payment: Paypal, check, or money order are all acceptable.
First response with a commitment to purchase gets the card.

Thanks for looking,

Joe

I'll take it.  Pm sent.

Thanks,
Steve
